    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Action
    Enumeration of logical control actions used for key bindings.
    AppInitializer
    Initializes the application's primary UI and stage.
    AudioSettings
    Backwards-compatible static facade for application audio settings.
    AudioSettingsService
    Contract describing instance-oriented audio settings handling.
    Board
    Board model interface describing operations the controllers call to manipulate and query the game board.
    BoardView
    Small helper that owns board rendering/layout concerns extracted from GuiController.
    Brick
    Represents a Tetris brick shape and its rotation matrices.
    BrickGenerator
    Produces bricks for gameplay and exposes a small preview API.
    BrickRotator
    Small utility that tracks the current rotation index for a Brick and provides the current and next rotation matrices.
    BrickShape
    Enum of brick identity and their display color.
    ClassicBattle
    Controller for the Classic Battle multiplayer UI.
    ClassicBattleAudioHelper
    Helper that centralises loading and lifecycle management for music and short sound effects used by the Classic Battle controller.
    ClassicBattleGameInitializer
    Extracted initializer responsible for wiring up the two game sides of ClassicBattle.
    ClassicBattleMatchManager
    Responsible for match lifecycle: watching for game-over, coordinating preview/audio stop, and invoking callbacks to show overlays or restart the match.
    ClassicBattleOverlayFactory
    Factory responsible for creating overlays used by ClassicBattle (controls and winner overlays).
    ClassicBattlePreviewService
    Small service to update the "next" preview boxes periodically.
    ClasspathResourceProvider
    Default ResourceProvider that resolves resources from the application's classpath using the current class loader.
    ClearRow
    Result object returned after clearing rows from the board.
    ClipLoader
    Loader utility for short sound effects.
    ClipLoader.AudioLoadResult
    Result returned by ClipLoader.load(String).
    ControlsController
    Controller for the controls UI.
    ControlsView
    Small UI helper that encapsulates common view operations used by ControlsController.
    CoopControlsOverlay
    Extracted controls overlay builder.
    CoopControlsOverlay.KeySet
     
    CoopGameController
    Controller coordinating the cooperative two-player game mode.
    CoopGuiController
     
    CoopInputHandler
    Small utility to manage attaching and detaching the coop key event filters.
    CoopKeyBindings
    Encapsulates multiplayer key bindings and preference persistence.
    CoopMusicManager
    Small helper to manage the lifecycle of the cooperative mode music player.
    CoopPlayerState
    Per-player runtime state used by the cooperative game controller.
    CoopPreviewManager
    Small helper responsible for building and refreshing the "next" previews for both players.
    CoopScore
     
    CoopSecondPlayerView
    Encapsulates the second player's brick and ghost panels and provides build/refresh methods formerly present in the controller.
    CoopStyleManager
    Utility to load and manage the coop UI stylesheet and provide safe helpers to add/remove style classes on JavaFX nodes.
    CoopTickHandler
    Encapsulates tick processing logic for cooperative mode.
    CoopTickHandler.TickOutcome
    Outcome returned by CoopTickHandler.processTick(int[][], CoopPlayerState, CoopPlayerState, CoopScore, boolean).
    CoopTickResult
    Result of a single cooperative game tick.
    DefaultAudioSettings
    Default AudioSettingsService implementation that persists values to a Preferences node.
    DownData
    Immutable result of a "down" operation for a player.
    EventSource
    Source of an input event.
    EventType
    Type of input event representing a requested piece action.
    GameController
    Adapter that connects the UI-level GuiController with the core GameEngine logic.
    GameEngine
    Encapsulates core game rules and board operations.
    GameOverPanel
    Simple reusable panel that displays a prominent "game over" message.
    GuiController
    Primary JavaFX controller for the single-player / local-multiplayer game view.
    GuiCountdown
    Small UI helper that encapsulates creation and lifecycle of a visual countdown used before game-start.
    GuiCountdownContext
    Context holder passed into the countdown helper to avoid long parameter lists.
    GuiCountdownController
    Helper to encapsulate the simple wiring required to start the game countdown overlay.
    GuiGameOverController
    Controller helpers for actions triggered from the game-over UI.
    GuiGameOverUI
    UI building helpers for the game-over overlay.
    GuiInitialize
    Small initialization helpers used by GuiController to keep the controller bootstrap code compact and testable.
    GuiOverlays
    UI builders for pause and controls overlays extracted from GuiController.
    GuiParticleHelpers
    Helper class for particle/visual effects previously living in GuiController.
    GuiViewHelpers
    Small companion helper for GUI view construction utilities extracted from GuiController.
    HandlingController
    Controller for adjusting input handling settings used by the game.
    IBrick
    I-shaped tetromino implementation.
    InputEventListener
    Listener interface for input events produced by the input subsystem.
    JBrick
    J-shaped tetromino implementation (left-oriented variant).
    KeyBindings
    Pure model class that stores key mappings for game actions.
    LBrick
    L-shaped tetromino implementation.
    Main
    JavaFX application entry point.
    MainMenuAudioManager
    Manages menu audio: background music and UI SFX for the main menu.
    MainMenuButtonEffectsHelper
    Provides visual hover animations and sound wiring for menu buttons.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the application's main menu UI.
    MainMenuControlSettings
    Simple data holder for control key bindings used by the main menu.
    MainMenuControlsHelper
    Helper to show the multiplayer controls overlay and collect the chosen key bindings.
    MainMenuControlsHelper.Result
     
    MainMenuHandlingSettings
    Data holder and UI helper for gameplay handling settings used by the main menu.
    MainMenuInitializer
    Helper to initialize the main menu UI.
    MainMenuInitializer.Result
     
    MainMenuMediaHelper
    Helper responsible for loading and managing the preview video shown in the main menu.
    MainMenuOverlayHelper
    Helper responsible for animating transitions between the main menu button column and overlay panes (settings, controls, etc.).
    MainMenuPreferences
    Helper that loads and saves main-menu related preferences using the Preferences API.
    MatrixOperations
    Small collection of matrix helpers used by the game logic and renderer.
    MediaPlayerFactory
    Factory responsible for creating and disposing MediaPlayer instances while attaching volume listeners that respond to AudioSettings changes.
    MoveDownResult
    Data transfer object returned by GameEngine.moveDown(com.comp2042.input.EventSource).
    MoveEvent
    Immutable value object describing a requested input action.
    NextShapeInfo
    Small immutable holder describing a preview shape and its horizontal position.
    NotificationPanel
    A small popup-style panel used to show one-off notifications (for example score/bonus messages) over the game UI.
    OBrick
    O-shaped (square) tetromino.
    ParticleHelper
    Small helper to centralize particle creation and flash effects so controllers can delegate to it.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    A simple random (bag) brick generator.
    ResourceProvider
    Abstraction for resolving application resources such as FXML and CSS.
    SBrick
    S-shaped tetromino implementation.
    Score
    Simple score container backed by a JavaFX IntegerProperty for UI binding.
    ScoreBattleController
    Controller coordinating a two-player "Score Battle" match.
    ScoreBattleControlsOverlay
    Helper class that builds and shows the multiplayer controls overlay used by `ScoreBattleController`.
    ScoreBattleInitializer
    Extracted initializer for ScoreBattleController.initBothGames.
    SimpleBoard
    Concrete Board implementation using a simple 2D int matrix as the background and a BrickGenerator to provide pieces.
    SoundManager
    High-level sound manager used by the application to play short effects and music tracks.
    TBrick
    T-shaped tetromino implementation.
    ViewData
    Immutable snapshot of the current view state needed by the renderer.
    ZBrick
    Z-shaped tetromino implementation.
